title: Substring Check (Bug Funny)
text: Given two binary strings, A (of length 10) and B (of length 5), output 1 if B is a substring of A and 0 otherwise.Please note, that the solution may only be submitted in the following languages: Brainf**k, Whitespace and Intercal.Input24 lines consisting of pairs of binary strings A and B separated by a single space.OutputThe logical value of: 'B is a substring of A'.ExampleFirst two lines of input:1010110010 101101110111011 10011First two lines of output:10
